text: Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen is a 1981 American mystery comedy movie directed by Clive Donner and is the latest movie in the Charlie Chan series. It stars Peter Ustinov, Michelle Pfeiffer, Lee Grant, Angie Dickinson, Roddy McDowall, Brian Keith, Rachel Roberts, Courteney Cox. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1981 mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Clive Donner Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Charlie Chan
title: Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen
